Text:

háháhhá. ez igen mond meg nekik :) 
Köszi a játékot. Jó látni hogy magyarok is töltögetnek. 10/10
thx, majdnem végig full sebességgel jött a cucc :)

how do i change the language to english?
also the new game or play menu is greyed out. so it looks like it isn't even payable or cracked!!

For English:
1. Download Demo

2. Go into c:\program files\Garbage Truck Simulator and find the application file

3. Copy this into the demo version folder and it should work
Isnt there an English version? Ive tried to download demo of english version  but what application files should i copy?

I know it for english:

1: install the english demo and install this torrent (the hungerian)

2: then, copy all files from the demo folder except the exe.files (the unnistal.exe and the application.exe) to the hungerian folder.

3: start it up with the exe. in the hungerian folder

everthing is now english :)
enjoy!!!
Nem lenne rossz, de közép kategóriás gépen is szaggat (2.6 dual core, 3gb ram, 512 vga) - és nem a csúcs grafika miatt:(
